methods.name: getX
methods.content: Gets the x coordinate of this `Pixel` in the image.

methods.name: getY
methods.content: Gets the y coordinate of this `Pixel` in the image.

methods.name: getSourceImage
methods.content: Gets the image that this `Pixel` is part of.

methods.name: getColor
methods.content: Gets the color of the `Pixel` in the image.

methods.name: setColor
methods.content: Sets the color of this `Pixel` in the image to the specified `Color`.

methods.name: getRed
methods.content: Returns the amount of red (ranging from 0 to 255) in the color of this `Pixel`.

methods.name: getGreen
methods.content: Returns the amount of green (ranging from 0 to 255) in the color of this `Pixel`.

methods.name: getBlue
methods.content: Returns the amount of blue (ranging from 0 to 255) in the color of this `Pixel`.

methods.name: setRed
methods.content: Sets the amount of red (ranging from `0` to `255`) in the color of this `Pixel`. Values below `0` will be ignored and set to `0`, and values above `255` with be ignored and set to `255`.
methods.parameters: [{"name":"value","type":"int","required":true,"description":"the amount of red (ranging from `0` to `255`) to set the color of this `Pixel`"}]

methods.name: setGreen
methods.content: Sets the amount of green (ranging from `0` to `255`) in the color of this `Pixel`. Values below `0` will be ignored and set to `0`, and values above `255` with be ignored and set to `255`.
methods.parameters: [{"name":"value","type":"int","required":true,"description":"the amount of green (ranging from `0` to `255`) to set the color of this `Pixel`"}]

methods.name: setBlue
methods.content: Sets the amount of blue (ranging from `0` to `255`) in the color of this `Pixel`. Values below `0` will be ignored and set to `0`, and values above `255` with be ignored and set to `255`.
methods.parameters: [{"name":"value","type":"int","required":true,"description":"the amount of blue (ranging from `0` to `255`) to set the color of this `Pixel`"}]
